name: The Legend Of Ivthrex
description:
An evil cult has opened a portal allowing the gryphon god Ivthrex. Now the modern world is thrown unto utter chaos with mythical beasts roaming the land. You must stop the evil cult and stop Ivthrex before it's too late.

Features:

Fast Paced First Person Combat

Powerful Enemy's

Mythical Creatures

Three Different Weapons

Voice Acting
